text: Rod Christopher Godwin Jr. (born February 27, 1996) is an American football wide receiver for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Penn State. He was drafted by the Buccaneers in the third round of the 2017 NFL Draft. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Penn State Nittany Lions bio *Tampa Bay Buccaneers bio Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:American football wide receivers Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers players
title: Chris Godwin
